attributes.additional_details: Set up fees need to go did you know after 12 months is up the set up fee you originally paid gets added on to your bill after uv all ready paid it once it's not on stop the over charges and put a stop to price rises person A pays £55 person B pays £35 same package different price person A Lives 1 cable road Person B lives next door got same package but both been charged different prices
attributes.background: Tv providers are over charging after your 12 months months are up ie sky charge £40 a month after the first year the price gose up upto £80/£90 a month for the same package everyone should be given the same price no matter what not different prices for each house
